title: Festka Scout x Ondrash & Kasparek is an amazing Artist Series bike you can actually buy
content:
Custom Festka road and gravel bikes are already dream bikes, but their latest collaboration with Czech abstract artists Ondrash & Kasparek for this ultra-limited-edition Scout gravel bike is next level. Adapting O&Kâ€™s vibrant water surface swirls from 2D canvas to the 3D surface of a bike is new to the pair, and results in some

The post Festka Scout x Ondrash & Kasparek is an amazing Artist Series bike you can actually buy appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
